about_the_game:
{ v e l o c i t y } is a momentum based puzzle-platformer game about saving and loading velocity.

imagine if ultrakill's movement and portal's atmosphere were taken and violently shaken until they became one small 12 oz serving of speed (not the drug, the concept of speed.), was thrown into dirt, and dropkicked onto a computer monitor.

that'd be { v e l o c i t y }.

the movement is composed of two main things.

1. THE MOVEMENT

fairly standard movement.

WASD movement, space to jump, shift to dash, and left control to crouch/slide. no speed limit.

2. THE TOOLS (THE COOL STUFF)

  • The Velocity Saver

the velocity saver, as you can tell from the name, saves velocity.

right mouse button to save, left click to use saved velocity.

  • Newtons 3rd law (The gun)

left mouse button to push an object, right to pull.

  • Portable Speed Swapper

Left mouse button to swap velocity with an object.

  • Portable Universal Spacial Fourth Dimensional Positional Swapper (patent pending.)

Most people we show that name to have a stroke.

Right mouse button to set position. Left mouse button to go to set position.

  • Secret 5th thing

really powerful

FIND MORE FEATURES RIGHT NOW!!!! GIVE ME YOUR MONEY IN EXCHANGE FOR GOODS AND SERVICES!!!

still not convinced? i know where you sleep at night.

(pretty sure valve would kill me if i didnt tell you that was a joke (pretty sure valve would kill me if i didnt tell you that valve killing me was a joke (valve will kill me regardless)))

{ v e l o c i t y } is a momentum based puzzle-platformer game about saving and loading velocity.

imagine if ultrakill's movement and portal's atmosphere were taken and violently shaken until they became one small 12 oz serving of speed (not the drug, the concept of speed.), was thrown into dirt, and dropkicked onto a computer monitor.

that'd be { v e l o c i t y }.

the movement is composed of two main things.

1. THE MOVEMENT

fairly standard movement.

WASD movement, space to jump, shift to dash, and left control to crouch/slide. no speed limit.

2. THE TOOLS (THE COOL STUFF)

  • The Velocity Saver

the velocity saver, as you can tell from the name, saves velocity.

right mouse button to save, left click to use saved velocity.

name: { v e l o c i t y }

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: anything
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: anything
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: { v e l o c i t y } is a lovechild of ultrakill's movement and portal's puzzles and atmosphere.
